description: This course provides first exposure to speaking and listening in Korean for students with no prior knowledge of Korean language. It will cover the following elements: Korean alphabets, elementary Korean vocabularies, sentence structure and grammar as used in the modern Korean society. These will be learned through speaking activities, listening comprehension exercises and conversational practice. Relevant cultural features of the language will be introduced throughout the course.
restricted: Summer Semester course offering may be cancelled unless a minimum of 20 students enrol.
